story_prompt: You wake up in the middle of the night, your arm hangs over the side of your bed. It’s pitch black & your room is shrouded in deep shadow. Something unseen seizes your hand. You grasp it tightly, knowing that first impressions are important & a firm, confident handshake establishes dominance.
output:
As you squeeze your grip, you feel a warmth emanating from within, spreading throughout your entire body. Your muscles relax, & you exhale a sigh of relief as the tension fades away like fog burning off in the sun.
A soft glow begins to permeate the room, lighting the space around you. A voice, deep yet gentle, speaks words of wisdom & encouragement. The words carry comfort, providing a sense of security in times of darkness.
The warmth intensifies, filling you with an indomitable will to rise above the shadows. Your heart swells with hope as the mysterious force continues to speak, offering solace from the uncertainty that once threatened to overwhelm you.
In a state of profound tranquility, you realize the voice isn't external, but an internal awakening—a manifestation of the strength, resilience, & wisdom that lies deep within your core. With newfound clarity, you know that the shadows can never extinguish the brightness that burns within you, illuminating the path forward.
With each passing moment, the glow grows stronger, enveloping your entire being in a celestial radiance. You emerge from the night, transformed by the mysterious encounter, ready to face the dawn with courage & conviction, fueled by the luminosity that now animates your spirit.
